title: Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) & Financial Analytics
summary: End-to-end financial management system designed to optimize practice solvency, minimize claim rejections, and accelerate revenue collection cycles.
description:
End-to-end financial management system designed to optimize practice solvency, minimize claim rejections, and accelerate revenue collection cycles (Days Sales Outstanding - DSO).

## Technical Architecture Components

- Clearinghouse integration gateway
- Predictive analytics engine (ML-based coding validation)
- Payment processing service (Stripe/Square integration)
- Financial data warehouse for analytics
- Automated reconciliation service

## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Gateway configuration and API handshakes

**Week 2:**
- Historical AR and patient ledger migration

**Week 3:**
- Fee schedule and denial routing logic customization

**Week 4:**
- Live transactional stream cutover

## Case Study Reference

**Multi-Specialty Clinic, New York**

- **Challenge:** 45-day average DSO, high manual entry errors
- **Outcome:** Reduced DSO to 18 days, recaptured $140K annually in under-billed revenue
